name: RADARjAM Alpha v03
description:
THIS GAME IS IN ALPHA
 Controls:

W: Move

Shift: Dodge [Costs 2 charge and evades locked on missiles]

Space: Bomb

Mouse: Aim

Mouse Left: Shoot [Cost 1 Charge]

Mouse Right: Radar [Cost 1 Charge]

Options and Multiplayer don't work yet. 

Enemies are at your doorstep, but you’re the one who knocks! Dodge what you cannot see in your radar equipped Fighter Jet. But beware, the enemy advances at every step! Dogfight with enemy Fighters, Hellmakers, Heat Seekers, Carriers, Bombers and more! Equip upgrades while the enemy gathers themselves for a counteroffensive. Combine kills and battle for glory at the top of the leaderboards! Enlist your friends and engage in the art of stealth aerial combat in 4 player online multiplayer Co-Op, or go head to head in versus mode!

Preparing for takeoff in Q2 2020

May the best ace, see all…
